sql.isNotEmpty: T.ROLE_ID in (SELECT R.ROLE_ID FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_USER_ROLE R, ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_USER H WHERE H.DEL_FLAG='0' AND R.USER_ID = H.ID AND H.LOGIN_NAME=#USER_ID#)

sqlMap.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT P.MENU_NO as MENU_ID,nvl(A.FILE_ADDR,' ') as FILE_ADDR ,P.MENU_NAME,P.MENU_URL,P.MENU_IMG,P.MENU_TYPE,P.MENU_PAR_NO as MENU_PAR_ID FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_MENU P LEFT JOIN ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA A ON P.Menu_Img=A.FILE_ID INNER JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_ROLE_MENU T ON P.MENU_NO=T.MENU_NO
ORDER BY P.MENU_NO
sqlMap.select: select C.DESCRIPTION as MENU_UPDATE_TIME from ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_DICT C WHERE C.TYPE='ROOT' AND C.VALUE='MENU_UPDATE_TIME'

SELECT DISTINCT P.MENU_SORT,P.MENU_CONTENT,P.MENU_DESC, P.MENU_NO as MENU_ID,nvl(A.FILE_ADDR,' ') as FILE_ADDR,P.MENU_NAME,P.MENU_URL,P.MENU_IMG,P.MENU_TYPE,P.MENU_PAR_NO as MENU_PAR_ID,P.MENU_STATUS,P.MUDULE_ID,P.MENU_LEVEL FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_MENU P LEFT JOIN ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA A ON P.MENU_IMG=A.FILE_ID INNER JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_ROLE_MENU T ON P.MENU_NO=T.MENU_NO
P.DEL_FLAG ='0'
T.ROLE_ID in ('$ROLE_ID$')
T.ROLE_ID in (SELECT R.ROLE_ID FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_USER_ROLE R, ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_USER H WHERE H.DEL_FLAG='0' AND R.USER_ID = H.ID AND H.LOGIN_NAME=#USER_ID#)
P.MENU_PAR_NO = #MENU_PAR_ID#
P.MENU_ABTYPE ='A'
P.MENU_NO = #MENU_ID#
P.MENU_LEVEL = #MENU_LEVEL#
ORDER BY P.MENU_SORT
SELECT COUNT('') CNT FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_MENU P INNER JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_ROLE_MENU T ON P.MENU_NO=T.MENU_NO

SELECT P.MENU_NO AS MENU_ID, NVL(A.FILE_ADDR,' ') AS FILE_ADDR , P.MENU_NAME, P.MENU_URL, P.MENU_IMG, P.MENU_TYPE, P.MUDULE_ID, P.MENU_PAR_NO AS MENU_PAR_ID FROM ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_MENU P LEFT JOIN ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA A ON P.Menu_Img=A.FILE_ID LEFT JOIN ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_MENU m ON m.menu_no=p.MENU_PAR_NO
P.DEL_FLAG ='0'
exists( select 1 from ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_MOBILE_ROLE_MENU T, ${schema.configPlat}.SYS_USER_ROLE ur, SYS_USER h where ur.user_id = h.id and h.del_flag ='0' and P.MENU_NO=T.MENU_NO and t.role_id = ur.role_id and h.login_name =#USER_ID# )
P.MENU_PAR_NO = #MENU_PAR_ID#
P.MENU_NO = #MENU_ID#
P.MENU_LEVEL = #MENU_LEVEL#
P.MENU_ABTYPE ='B'
P.MENU_STATUS ='0'
order by NVL(m.MENU_SORT, p.MENU_SORT), DECODE(m.MENU_SORT, NULL, 0, p.MENU_SORT),p.MENU_NO
